parameter.name: TNTRegisConnectionString-Web.config Connection String

parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=vmtntsql2.westeurope.cloudapp.azure.com;Initial Catalog=TNTRegis;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=tntcomputers;Password=Traxdata13?; Connect Timeout=20000; Pooling='true'; MultipleActiveResultSets=True; Timeout = 10000; max pool size=10000;
